resources.string: Please refresh or add passwords to get started

Advanced PassGen was created by DeadLine.

This app can be used to generate strong and secure passwords on the fly. Advertisements and trackers are not included in this build.

 All images were provided by Google, except for the Facebook, GitHub and Bluesky logo, which were provided by Icons8 (icons8.com).

Copyright Â© 2025 CodeDead
If you found a bug or if you have suggestions for new features, you can reach out to us.\n\nYou can either create a new issue on GitHub or you can send an email to support@codedead.com
